name: Music_409.wav
keywords: ['amateur recording', 'latin dance music', 'male vocal', 'loud singing', 'bass guitar', 'electric guitar', 'acoustic latin drums', 'cheerful', 'lively']
caption: This is an amateur recording of a latin dance music piece. The audio quality is not that great. There is a male vocalist singing loudly. A bass guitar is playing a groovy bass line while an electric guitar is strumming chords in a syncopated manner. The rhythmic background is provided by a barely heard latin acoustic drum beat. The atmosphere is cheerful. This piece could be sampled for use in the making of a latin influenced hip-hop beat.
